feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:27 p.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 2:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: ENE calm km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain changing to rain or freezing rain near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Rain or freezing rain early in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
